channel.description: What's happening?! - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

item.title: RT Subscriptions: You asked (loudly), we listened. We’ve reduced the signup flow for creators from 27 steps to just 4. It’s never been easier to ear...
item.description:
RT Subscriptions
You asked (loudly), we listened.

We’ve reduced the signup flow for creators from 27 steps to just 4.

It’s never been easier to earn a living on Twitter. Tap on “Monetization” in settings to apply today.
item.author: Twitter

item.title: Say goodbye to prying eyes and hello to secure conversations. We're giving early access to Encrypted Direct Messages v1 to our verified users. We're e...
item.description:
Say goodbye to prying eyes and hello to secure conversations. We're giving early access to Encrypted Direct Messages v1 to our verified users.

We're excited to get feedback, improve the experience, and roll it out to even more users. Learn more: https://help.twitter.com/using-twitter/encrypted-direct-messages
item.author: Twitter

item.title: WORLDWIDE! Creators across the globe can now sign up and earn a living on Twitter. Tap on “Monetization” in settings to apply today. For a full list...
item.description:
WORLDWIDE! Creators across the globe can now sign up and earn a living on Twitter.

Tap on “Monetization” in settings to apply today.

For a full list of available countries see our Help Center:

https://help.twitter.com/using-twitter/subscriptions-creator
item.author: Twitter

item.title: Creators can now sign up and earn a living directly on Twitter in the EU, UK, and EEA. Tap on “Monetization” in settings to apply today. For a full ...
item.description:
Creators can now sign up and earn a living directly on Twitter in the EU, UK, and EEA.

Tap on “Monetization” in settings to apply today.

For a full list of available countries see our Help Center: https://help.twitter.com/using-twitter/subscriptions-creator
item.author: Twitter

item.title: Creators can now sign up and earn a living directly on Twitter in Japan, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand. Tap on “Monetization” in settings to ap...
item.description:
Creators can now sign up and earn a living directly on Twitter in Japan, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand.

Tap on “Monetization” in settings to apply today.
item.author: Twitter

item.title: Re thanks for your patience as we’ve worked to make Blue better – we’re excited and looking forward to sharing more with you soon!

item.author: Twitter

item.title: Re subscribers will be able to change their handle, display name or profile photo, but if they do they’ll temporarily lose the blue checkmark until t...
item.description: Re subscribers will be able to change their handle, display name or profile photo, but if they do they’ll temporarily lose the blue checkmark until their account is reviewed again
item.author: Twitter

item.title: Re we’ll begin replacing that “official” label with a gold checkmark for businesses, and later in the week a grey checkmark for government and mult...
item.description: Re we’ll begin replacing that “official” label with a gold checkmark for businesses, and later in the week a grey checkmark for government and multilateral accounts
item.author: Twitter

item.title: Re when you subscribe you’ll get Edit Tweet, 1080p video uploads, reader mode, and a blue checkmark (after your account has been reviewed)
item.description: Re when you subscribe you’ll get Edit Tweet, 1080p video uploads, reader mode, and a blue checkmark (after your account has been reviewed)
item.author: Twitter

item.title: we’re relaunching @TwitterBlue on Monday – subscribe on web for $8/month or on iOS for $11/month to get access to subscriber-only features, includin...
item.description: we’re relaunching @TwitterBlue on Monday – subscribe on web for $8/month or on iOS for $11/month to get access to subscriber-only features, including the blue checkmark 🧵 https://t.co/DvvsLoSO50
